name: Supercell Slam
description: You electrify your body and drop onto the target. Make a melee attack, doing 2d8 + MOVE electric damage on a hit. On a miss, you take typeless damage equal to your proficiency bonus.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
